title: traditional services
extract: used to describe a business that provides customers with a complete range of services: I need to find a good full-service bank. used to describe a restaurant or petrol station where you are served by an employee rather than collecting food or filling your car yourself: Some drivers prefer full-service stations. Compare.

Compare.
